dublin_core.dcvalue: In this paper we discuss the meaning advantages and methods of applying the point of care testing POCT and medical digital assistant MDA to primary healthcare services We also introduce the development of the POCT and MDA based on the electronic health record EHR system
Zhongguo yi liao qi xie za zhi = Chinese journal of medical instrumentation
[Development of POCT and medical digital assistant for primary medical healthcare].
